sub-events.comment: how often the ants spawn is based on what level you're on.
timer counts down until next level
ants target a piece of food
when swiped, ants no longer target a food
when swiped, ants are turned in the opposite direction and no longer target a food
this is the old way it worked
destroy ants that are no longer needed
when paused, the paddle shouldn't work on anything (?)
when unpausing, there's a countdown before starting the game again
